bibl.title: An Additional Note on Ῥουζικόν (Ar. rizq).
bibl.note: Supplement to: IDEM, Ῥουζικόν and Ῥογά in the Post-Conquest Papyri, ZPE 100 (1994) pp. 126-128; - A Note on Roga in ZPE 94 (1992) and ZPE 100 (1994), ZPE 105 (1995) p. 260. - P. 281: Provisional list of rizk / rouzikon documents from Palestine and Egypt (674-719 p.C.).
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, An Additional Note on Ῥουζικόν (Ar. rizq).

Supplement to: IDEM, Ῥουζικόν and Ῥογά in the Post-Conquest Papyri, ZPE 100 (1994) pp. 126-128; - A Note on Roga in ZPE 94 (1992) and ZPE 100 (1994), ZPE 105 (1995) p. 260. - P. 281: Provisional list of rizk / rouzikon documents from Palestine and Egypt (674-719 p.C.).
